attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With a credit crunch stop spending tax payers money on taking government to big cities to hold meetings.  You never meet the people anyway and it is just another excuse for an afternoon away at a high cost to the tax payers

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
